text: Allahâ€Œ kono manusera jan'ya tara abhyantare duti hrdaya srsti karenani. Ara tomadera strigana, yadera sathe tomara yihara kare thaka, tini taderake tomadera janani karenani [1] ebam tomadera posya putraderake tini tomadera putra karenani [2]; egulo tomadera mukhera katha. Ara allahâ€Œ satya katha'i balena ebam tini'i sarala patha nirdesa karena
